application_id()
authentication_url(params = {})

Generates the url—including the signature—for Yahoo BBAuth needed to retrieve the token for a user

generate_signature(action, params)

Generates a signature which must be appended to BBAuth requests

login_url()

Returns the url within your application that automatically redirects the user to the Yahoo login page for your application

request_yahoo_credentials(token)

Call this method inside the action where you verify your user’s login.

Returns a Hash containing :auth_cookie and :wssid, allowing you to make authenticated calls to Yahoo’s web services.

:timeout is also provided to allow seamless request of new credentials when they have expired.

secret()

Returns the shared secret generated when registering your application

token_request_url(token)

Generates the url—including the signature—for Yahoo BBAuth needed to retrieve the credentials (wssid and cookie) to make an authenticated request to a Yahoo web service
